div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-EehZO jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

small.em: The mission of Gentry Public Schools is to work with the Community in providing safe and successful educational experiences for each student.

div.p: Governor Asa Hutchinson Closed all schools to on-site instruction for the rest of the 19-20 school year this afternoon.
Gentry Public Schools will continue with the system we have in place, digital instruction in Google Classroom, through the last day of school which at this time is May 22.

p.a: More Information Can Be Found Here

div.p: Due to FBI Warnings about attackers inappropriately attacking Zoom Meetings we are not publicly posting our Zoom Links this week. Please have your child login to Google Classroom to access teachers Zoom Meeting Links.
Special Board Meeting - Tuesday April 28th, 2020 6:30pm at the PAC

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc

p.a: Campus Map for Patrons and Visitors

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Lunch applications are available in the office at each campus

p.a: Click Here For Printable Lunch Application

div.p: Lunch applications can be filled out at any time and have benefits for families and the school.

a.title: Open Presentation, Slideshow for District Website

div.p: Students in grades 8th-11th will register for their 2020-2021 high school courses beginning Thursday, March 12th through Thursday, April 9th. Students will meet with their CAP advisor during Encore.
Parents may meet with their student's advisor by scheduling an appointment. All appointments must be schedule through the advisor's email account. Email Addresses can be found here.

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.p: The Gentry Public Library has a lot of Important Educational Resources for families with children during these times Click here to Check it Out
They are also offering Library Cards please Call 479-736-2054 or Email bookmark@gentrylibrary.us

p.strong: Applications for Free/Reduced Price meals for students are available at each campus office and Central office Click Here For More Information
